mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTTITLE, NAMECHN, GOALSELL, EXPRESSTYPE, ESTIMATEWEIGHT, ANTISTOP, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, CREATECHECKOPER, CREATECHECKTIME, MARKETOPER, FORECASTGROSS, FORECASTSELLNUM, QUALITY, SECULAR, COUNTRY, IFOLDSKU, URGENT, OPER, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, CORPID, PRODUCTNUM, STATUS, PURCHASEFLOWOPER, FINISHTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE11, RESERVE12, RESERVE13, RESERVE14, RESERVE15, RESERVE16, RESERVE17, RESERVE18, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, CATEGORYID, CATEGORYNAME, LENGTHNUM, WIDTHNUM, HEIGHTNUM, DELIVERYTIME, TOTALASSESS, YIELDLY, FINIDHTIME, CHECKSIMPLETIME, CHECKOPER, CHECKPURCHASETIME, PRODUCTSOURCE, GOALACCOUNT, PHOTOURL, URL, GOALADRESS, NOTE, PICTURE, CONTENT, PRODUCTNOTE from db_productdevelop where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTTITLE, NAMECHN, GOALSELL, EXPRESSTYPE, ESTIMATEWEIGHT, ANTISTOP, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, CREATECHECKOPER, CREATECHECKTIME, MARKETOPER, FORECASTGROSS, FORECASTSELLNUM, QUALITY, SECULAR, COUNTRY, IFOLDSKU, URGENT, OPER, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, CORPID, PRODUCTNUM, STATUS, PURCHASEFLOWOPER, FINISHTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE11, RESERVE12, RESERVE13, RESERVE14, RESERVE15, RESERVE16, RESERVE17, RESERVE18, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, CATEGORYID, CATEGORYNAME, LENGTHNUM, WIDTHNUM, HEIGHTNUM, DELIVERYTIME, TOTALASSESS, YIELDLY, FINIDHTIME, CHECKSIMPLETIME, CHECKOPER, CHECKPURCHASETIME, PRODUCTSOURCE, GOALACCOUNT, PHOTOURL, URL, GOALADRESS, NOTE, PICTURE, CONTENT, PRODUCTNOTE from db_productdevelop
